meanings.definition: A polygon that can be flexed or folded to reveal different sides.
meanings.sent1: I made a flexagon in art class by folding paper in a special way.
meanings.sent2: The flexagon showed different colors as I folded it back and forth.
meanings.sent3: The flexagon decided to show its hidden side only when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was like a flexagon, always revealing new facets of herself.
meanings.sent5: The flexagon's transformation from a triangle to a hexagon amazed everyone.

meanings.definition: An object that can be manipulated to change its shape.
meanings.sent1: He used a flexagon to demonstrate how shapes can change with movement.
meanings.sent2: The flexagon transformed into a star when he twisted it just right.
meanings.sent3: The flexagon refused to stay in one shape, constantly shifting and morphing.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a flexagon, always adapting to new information.
meanings.sent5: The flexagon's flexibility made it a favorite toy for the children.
